sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO board(boardID, userID, title, content, b_file, regDate, viewCnt) values(nboard_seq.nextval, #userID#, #title#, #content#, #b_file#, #regDate#, #viewCnt#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT boardID, title, userID, regDate, viewCnt FROM board ORDER BY boardID
SELECT boardID, userID, title, content, b_file, regDate, viewCnt FROM board WHERE boardID=#boardID#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE board SET viewCnt = #viewCnt# WHERE boardID = #boardID#
